mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_delivery ( dv_num, sl_id, dv_exist, dv_how, dv_courier, dv_fee, dv_extrafee, dv_adr1, dv_adr2, dv_rffee, dv_exfee, dv_exadr1, dv_exadr2) VALUES (#{dv_num}, 'codingking', #{sl_id}, #{dv_how}, #{dv_courier}, #{dv_fee}, #{dv_extrafee}, #{dv_adr1}, #{dv_adr2}, #{dv_rffee}, #{dv_exfee}, #{dv_exadr1}, #{dv_exadr2})
